sect.title: Introduction
sect.para: This document outlines the procedure for replacing a bike fork. It details the necessary steps, precautions, and references to relevant documentation.

list.item: Standard Bike Tools (Wrenches, Allen Keys, etc.)
Reference Documentation (as indicated throughout the procedure)
Ensure the bike is securely positioned on a repair stand or stable surface.
Disconnect any electrical components if applicable.

sect.title: Title
sect.para: Preparation

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Remove Front Wheel: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-DA0-3-0-00-00-AA-520/> for instructions on front wheel removal.

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Remove Front Brakes: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-DA1-2-0-00-00-AA-520/> for instructions on front brake removal.

sect.title: Title
sect.para: Fork Removal

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Remove Fork: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-D00-0-0-01-00-AA-520/> for instructions on fork removal.

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Change Bike Axis: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-D00-0-0-01-00-AA-93A/> for instructions on changing the bike axis.

sect.title: Title
sect.para: Fork Installation

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Install New Fork: Options depend on the specific fork model.

sect.title: Title
sect.para: Option 1

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-D00-0-0-01-00-AA-720/>.

sect.title: Title
sect.para: Option 2

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-D00-0-0-01-00-AB-720/>.

sect.title: Title
sect.para: Reassembly

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Install Front Brakes: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-DA1-2-0-00-00-AA-720/> for instructions on front brake installation.

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Install Front Wheel: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-DA0-3-0-00-00-AA-720/> for instructions on front wheel installation.

sect.title: Title
sect.para: Testing & Verification

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Fork Installation Test: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-D00-0-0-01-00-AA-341/> to verify proper fork installation.

sect.title: Instruction
sect.para: Front Brakes Test: Refer to documentation <dmref:BRAKE-DA1-0-0-00-00-AA-341/> to verify proper brake function.

sect.title: Closing_remarks
sect.para: This procedure provides a general guideline for bike fork replacement. Always consult the manufacturer's specifications and safety guidelines for your specific bike and components. Ensure all connections are secure before operating the bike.
